witnessStr: STEYN Hermanus, KUUN Elisabeth Louisa, PIETERSE Ferdinand Albertus, SLABBERT Hendrina Maria, BERG GN vd (as doop Vader), SLABBERT F. Jac. M. (as doop Moder)
source: Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Colesberg,  Baptism register, 1837-1843. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G16 3/2.  Note: Colesberg established 1826 from Graaff-Reinet. Transcribed by Annelie Els, independently, from Pretoria Archives FK 2277.
searchParameters: Child with berg anywhere in the surname with Elisabeth Louisa anywhere in the first name in all the registers.
